snippet.title: History of Portal: Still Alive - VNN Exclusive
snippet.description:
Twitch : https://www.twitch.tv/tylermcvicker/ Patreon : https://www.patreon.com/valvenewsnetwork
Watch my Streams : http://www.twitch.tv/valvenewsnetwork
Steam Group : http://steamcommunity.com/groups/VNN

Today on Valve News Network, we take a look at the short and eventful history of the Xbox 360 Arcade port of Portal: Still Alive. 

Sources : https://www.engadget.com/2008/07/20/portal-still-alive-additional-levels-based-off-portal-the-flas/
http://kotaku.com/5026728/portal-still-alive-will-include-new-puzzles-but-no-new-plot
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8BMT4gYrUKA

Download the PC Port of Still Alive : http://www.moddb.com/mods/portal-still-alive-pc

Thanks to Lever Software;

PistonMiner : http://steamcommunity.com/id/PistonMiner/
(STEAM_0:0:76250393)
Jackathan : http://steamcommunity.com/id/Jackathantwo/ (STEAM_0:0:84638536)
maxx : http://steamcommunity.com/id/maxx02/
(STEAM_0:0:44242093)
And Me! 

My Social Media : 
Twitter : https://twitter.com/ValveNewsNetwor
Instagram :  https://www.instagram.com/valvenewsnetwork/
Waffler Weekly : goo.gl/Fm28Ge
